_sText:
IMPORTANT:
sv_airaccelerate 150
sv_maxvelocity 10,000 (Manually adjust this in momentum)
Tier 4
5 stages and 1 bonus

Zones included. Stage transition zones are between the green stripes for consistency (see picture 2)
Map ends on the bridge between the 2 green doors (see picture 7)

    More Stuff:
Surf_drifting is a sequel to my first map, surf_driftless. Map was originally intended to be linear; individual stages may not flow well. 
In my opinion most of the surf is tier 3 with a few tricky parts but the stages are very long. Bonus is probably tier 2; teleport to bonus is located at stage 1 start. 
If you aren't playing the map on CSGO and experience lag, try disabling HDR. Also, and this works for CSGO as well, 
try r_3dsky 0. 
Most of the wall lights are illusionary (you can go through them)
There are a lot of landmarks in the map. Playing with high ping will reduce gameplay quality

CSGO port: https://gamebanana.com/maps/198633

Thanks to Silverthing and Profile for the video:
https://youtu.be/06GOhAZCCnQ
